targets.expr: count by (label_karpenter_sh_nodepool) (kube_node_labels{node=~"$node", node!~"^fargate-.*", label_karpenter_sh_nodepool=~"$nodepool"})
count by (label_karpenter_sh_nodepool) (kube_node_labels{node=~"$node", node=~"^fargate-.*", label_karpenter_sh_nodepool=~"$nodepool"})

sum(
  sum by (node) (container_cpu_allocation{})
  * avg by (node) (node_cpu_hourly_cost{node=~"$node", node=~"fargate.*", label_karpenter_sh_nodepool=~"$nodepool"})
)
+
sum(
  sum by (node) (container_memory_allocation_bytes{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 + 0.25)
  * avg by (node) (node_ram_hourly_cost{node=~"$node", node=~"fargate.*", label_karpenter_sh_nodepool=~"$nodepool"})
)

options.content: To Node Panel
Uptime
Hourly Cost

targets.expr:
(sum(node_total_hourly_cost{node=~"$node", node!~"fargate.*"}) or vector(0))
+
(sum(container_cpu_allocation{node=~"$node", node=~"fargate.*"}) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{node=~"$node"}) or vector(0))
+
(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{node=~"$node", node=~"fargate.*"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 + 0.25) * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost{node=~"$node"}) or vector(0))
kube_node_labels{node=~"$node"}

options.content: Pods

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_info{node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="pods", node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="pods", node=~"$node"})

options.content: CPU Usage

targets.expr: sum(machine_cpu_cores{node=~"$node"})
sum(machine_cpu_cores{node=~"$node"})

options.content: RAM Usage

targets.expr: machine_memory_bytes{node=~"$node"}
machine_memory_bytes{node=~"$node"}

options.content: CPU Requests

targets.expr: sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", node=~"$node"})

options.content: RAM Requests

targets.expr: sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", node=~"$node"})
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", node=~"$node"})
